pageProps.content:
[![Image from Gyazo](https://i.gyazo.com/866620a460b6f3efe33fb4876e1cdbec.gif)](https://gyazo.com/866620a460b6f3efe33fb4876e1cdbec) This prototype uses [Orphe Track](https://orphe.io/track), which is smart footwear by ORPHE Inc., to capture movements of the foot. I connected the signals from the shoes to Max/MSP application via OSC, to design the audio effect control. ### Electric Guitar Wah
### Drum Kit Filter

data.title: Orphe Track Effects - prototyping of smart shoes sound effects
